TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIModalTransitionStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of values used to specify the transition style of presented s.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIModalTransitionStyle CoverVertical = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Slides up from the bottom of the screen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIModalTransitionStyle CrossDissolve = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The old view fades out while the new view simultaneously fades in.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIModalTransitionStyle FlipHorizontal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A horizontal right-to-left flip. On dismissal, the transition flips left-to-right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIModalTransitionStyle PartialCurl = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A corner of the presented is "curled up" like a book page. On transition, the curl peels up the screen. Application developers must only use this style when the is being presented with .
